Careers

Join us in shaping the future of enterprise AI

Our Culture

What makes working at Bixing Technology special

Innovation

We foster a culture of innovation where new ideas are encouraged and celebrated. Our team members are empowered to think creatively and push boundaries.

Collaboration

We believe in the power of teamwork. Our collaborative environment brings together diverse perspectives to solve complex problems and deliver exceptional results.

Growth

We're committed to the personal and professional growth of our team members. We provide opportunities for learning, development, and advancement.

Integrity

We operate with honesty, transparency, and ethical responsibility. Our commitment to integrity guides our decisions and actions in all aspects of our business.

Diversity

We celebrate diversity and inclusion. Our global team brings together different backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives to drive innovation and excellence.

Work-Life Balance

We value the well-being of our team members and promote a healthy work-life balance. We offer flexible work arrangements and prioritize mental health.

Benefits & Perks

We take care of our team with competitive benefits and perks

Comprehensive Health Coverage

We offer comprehensive medical, dental, and vision insurance plans for you and your dependents.

Competitive Compensation

We offer competitive salaries, equity options, and performance-based bonuses to reward your contributions.

Generous Time Off

Enjoy generous paid time off, including vacation days, sick leave, and holidays to rest and recharge.

Learning & Development

Access to continuous learning opportunities, including conferences, workshops, and education reimbursement.

Flexible Work Environment

Enjoy flexible work hours and remote work options to help you maintain a healthy work-life balance.

Office Perks

Enjoy a modern office with catered meals, snacks, coffee, and team-building activities.

Employee Stories

Hear from our team members about their experience working at Bixing Technology

"Working at Bixing Technology has been an incredible journey. The culture of innovation and continuous learning has helped me grow both professionally and personally. I'm constantly challenged and inspired by the brilliant minds I work with every day."
S

Sarah Chen

Machine Learning Engineer

M

Michael Wang

AI Research Scientist

"Joining Bixing Technology was one of the best decisions of my career. The company provides ample opportunities for growth and development. I've been able to work on cutting-edge projects that are making a real impact in the world of AI, which is incredibly fulfilling."
E

AI Solutions Consultant
